about_the_game:
Puzzle Depot is a retro-inspired puzzle-based adventure game, featuring fun characters, vast environments, and a robust level editor. Journey through a post-apocalyptic world, solving puzzles with a staggering number of mechanics and object interactions.

Welcome to Union Freight Operations


What starts as a simple matter of pushing boxes around a warehouse quickly escalates into a perilous adventure through a world of giant insects and rogue robots. Survive deadly roach-filled grottos, bubbling lakes of caustic goop, and the twisted industrial ruins of the eponymous Depot-13. Join survivors Stella, Todd, and other memorable characters in this comedic retro-futuristic brain-expanding quest through the most puzzling of Depots!

Are you prepared for an exciting career in the field of cargo management?

Features

  • A classic pixel-art aesthetic and bumpin' soundtrack brings the world of Puzzle Depot to life!
  • Each sprawling level is jam-packed with puzzling rooms, optional goals, and secrets to find.
  • Battle foes, collect loot, and push the boundaries of the sokoban genre.
  • Several playable characters with unique abilities for tackling the Depot's many challenges.
  • Discover deep lore and bad jokes through various notes, datalogs, and dialogue.
  • Create and share your own nefarious puzzles with a fully-featured level editor!

name: Puzzle Depot

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: 1ghz+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: 1ghz+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: A box-pushing, bug-squishing, post-apocalyptic adventure awaits you in Puzzle Depot! Challenge hundreds of meticulously designed rooms that blend classic box puzzles with new and creative mechanics, or build your own devious creations with the level editor.
